message.content:
{"id": "11314", 
 "title": "Bug 11314: Replace package name fragments should always be smaller", 
 "description": "When using the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field in the preferences (Java Work in progress), if com.ibm.foobar is being replaced with co~.ib~.foobar, it should only be replaced if the compressed name is actually smaller. Currently, it is being replaced even if the compressed name is larger.", 
 "OB": "Currently, in the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field, com.ibm.foobar is being replaced with co~.ib~.foobar, even if the compressed name is larger.", 
 "EB": "In the 'Replace package name fragments with:' field, com.ibm.foobar should only be replaced with co~.ib~.foobar if the compressed name is actually smaller.", 
 "SR": "In build 20020214, if you enter '2~.', the package name fragment should not be replaced if the compressed name will be larger."}
